Cincinnati.WDBZ: WDBZ is an urban oldies-formatted radio station serving Cincinnati, Ohio broadcasting on 1230 AM. The station plays urban oldies music except for weekdays between 10am and Noon, during which time talk show "The Lincoln Ware Show" airs. Saturday mornings and afternoons also feature talk shows. Owned by Radio One, its studios are located at Centennial Plaza in Downtown Cincinnati and the transmitter site is in Eden Park.
